promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a chibi young simple goat electric-type pokemon wearing a white crown. It can be found in thunderstorm-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, electric or goat. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Voltkidd, a a chibi young simple goat electric-type pokemon. It can be found in thunderstorm-like environments It has the following abilities: Gigaspark, Harmonize. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "goat", "electric" or "Voltkidd". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of electric-type pokemon, goat-like, simple, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, yellow and teal ambient lighting
generatedDescription: This playful youngster channels the fury of lightning storms to energize itself. It harmonizes with the booming Thunder and uses it to unleash its Gigaspark ability. Often found embracing the chaos of tempestuous weather.
